body:
so much Shinji x Misato from the artist
but so few Asuka x Kanji

I know their relationship was a thing in the 1997 anime, but heck I can't find much doujins involving them

I love shota, but I also want to see Asuka being devoured by Kanji as well, at least having as much pages as Misato has here

I just can't fucking help myself!!!!!!
Every time I see Shinji and Misato getting naughty and nasty with each other I find myself pulling out my big ol meat log with even realising it.............these two characters have me hooked on milf x shota porn. 
But that's not a bad thing. This shit makes me cum so fucking hard. Those side by side masturbation pages showing a grown ass gorgeous mommy whore and an underaged teen boy playing with themselves until they orgasm..........by far the most forbidden type of playtime I know. 
Here you go Misato you boy cock loving slut.......ohhhhh....AHNNNN ❤❤❤❤❤💦💦💦💦💦💦💦💦💦💦💦💦💦
Diving into the past of the site Biribbiri? Good find. Very interesting indeed.
Actually you can do anywhere from 000001-219000. By the way did you know the first doujin on Nhentai was A FUCKING LOLI DOUJIN?! This is truly a revelation.

Came up with a fun game, type in any number from 100000(or less, havent tested it yet) to 219000 in the url after the second slash. Example: www.nhentai.net/g/185359. Somehow I landed on one of my favorites, lucky me. By the way I don't know what the doujin is in that example url so I'm gonna go check it out.
